Boilerplate:Item Set

ADVERTISEMENT
From Diablo Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search

Add an intro blurb where the name of the set is bolded. This is a suggestion:

Item Set is an Item Set used most often by the Class in Diablo II.


Contents

  • 1 Background
  • 2 Diablo II Item Set
  • 3 Item List
  • 4 Media
  • 5 Development
  • 6 References

Background[edit]

Add as much background as possible. Add image floated right if available.

It's important to use "noinclude" tags around all content of this article, except the infobox. 

{{Itembox
|game=                        Diablo II
|portrait=                    Set-trangs-full-s.jpg
|portrait-width=              85px
|d2x=                         Yes
|patch=                       1.10
|name=                        Trang-Oul's Avatar
|type=                        Item Set
|item_set=                    Yes
|set_piece1=                  Trang-Oul's Guise
|set_piece2=                  Trang-Oul's Scales
|set_piece3=                  Trang-Oul's Girth
|set_piece4=                  Trang-Oul's Claws
|set_piece5=                  Trang-Oul's Wing
|set_piece6=                  Tal Rasha's Adjudication
|set_2_bonus1=                +15% Mana Regeneration
|set_2_bonus2=                +15% Mana Regeneration
|set_3_bonus1=                +15% Mana Regeneration
|set_4_bonus1=                +15% Mana Regeneration
|set_full_bonus1=             +50% Resistance To All
|set_full_bonus2=             +3 to All Skills
|set_full_bonus3=             Goes up to 15 full bonuses.
|head= Yes                    Used on this location? Yes or delete/comment out entry.
|neck= Yes                    Yes
|chest=                       Yes
|main_hand=                   Yes
|off_hand=                    Yes
|catexclude=                  Yes (wrapped in a noinclude)
|item_set_short=              Yes (wrapped in a noinclude)
|ilvl=                        32
}}


Diablo II Item Set[edit]

In-game information, such as what it's good for, bad for etc. Drawbacks and advantages. As much as possible.


Item List[edit]

Just use the Itemlist template like this. It's very important the |Yes variable is there. 

{{Itemlist
|{{:Trang-Oul's Guise|Yes}}
|{{:Trang-Oul's Scales|Yes}}
|{{:Trang-Oul's Girth|Yes}}
}}


Media[edit]

Add gallery and whatever other media is available. Re-list the items already used in the article.

  • Full set worn

  • In-game art of the Helmet

  • In-game art of the Body Armor

  • In-game art of the Belt


Development[edit]

Add development info here. When it was introduced, major changes etc. This is a suggested blurb:

This item set was introduced in Patch 1.10 together with a host of other Item Sets. Significant changes to the game made some item sets less useful and others more so. Runewords became the over-all long-term gear goal for players, taking some shine away from item sets.


References[edit]

Add any and all references used for the article. These ones are suggested to always add:

  • Original Diabloii.net material.
  • Patch 1.10
  • Diablo II Manual
